name: Crazy Ball!
description:
Welcome to Crazy Ball!

The rules are simple: one player controls the red ball (left), another controls the right. The goal is to collect as many points as possible before time runs out! You have 2 minutes.

Controls: Red

Movement: WSAD

Jump: E

Controls: Green

Movement: Arrows

Jump: Space

Points:

Powercube - 4

Hitting a wall - minus 1

Collision - Player who strikes with higher velocity gets a point, other player loses a point.

If you fall off the platform, you lose!

Hint: While your opponent is still bouncing from a jump, give them a quick strike to knock them clear of the platform!

Have Fun!
